title: Exorcise American History! Olympics Money > Human Safety 5.26.21
itunes:title: Exorcise American History! Olympics Money > Human Safety 5.26.21
description:
In episode 917, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Guy Montgomery to discuss Republicans weaponizing anti-semitism, priests exorcising critical race theory out of people, the Olympics in Japan, fans returning to sports games, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. WATCH: 6PM News and Athletes | Guy Montgomery
  2. 199 House Republicans have embraced anti-Semitism and violence
  3. We Stand in Solidarity With Nikole Hannah-Jones
  4. The Exorcists Who Are Battling Black Lives Matter
  5. Olympics Chief Says Cancellation ‘Off the Table’ Even After Dire U.S. Travel Warning Over COVID Surge
  6. Fans Are Back and Acting Crazy. Sports Are Back to Normal.
  7. Box Office: ‘Raya And The Last Dragon’ Passes ‘Wonder Woman 1984’ As ‘Wrath Of Man’ Tops $70M Global
  8. LISTEN: Dirty Art Club - Videotape

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
